FAO.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a note written on a letter or envelope when you want a particular person in an organization to see it or deal with it
FAO.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: written abbreviation for FOR THE ATTENTION OF
FAO.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: the Food and Agricultural Organization; a department of the UNITED NATIONS that has the aim of improving food production and distribution throughout the world and improving NUTRITION (= the qualities in food that help people grow and be healthy)
